member.name: T:ThreadData
member.summary: Provides strong-typed access to local storage data.

member.name: M:ThreadData.SetData``1(``0)
member.summary: Sets the given data in the storage. The returned can be used to remove the state when disposed.

member.name: M:ThreadData.GetData``1
member.summary: Gets the data from the storage.

member.name: M:ThreadData.SetData``1(System.Threading.Thread,``0)
member.summary: Sets the given data in the storage. The returned can be used to remove the state when disposed.

member.name: M:ThreadData.GetData``1(System.Threading.Thread)
member.summary: Gets the data from the storage.
member.param: The thread to get data from
